## updateTasks() function

Update multiple tasks with the same properties in a single operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function updateTasks(
  taskIds: string[],
  options: TaskUpdateOptions
): Promise<CliOutput<BatchResult<BatchCompleteItem>>>;
```
